# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(lata_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(lata)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
lataPluginInfo.C
lataCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
lataPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
lataMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtlataFileFormat.C
LataDB.C
LataFilter.C
LataStructures.C
LataV1_field_definitions.C
LataWriter.C
Lata_tools.C
LmlReader.C
OpenDXWriter.C
OperatorBoundary.C
OperatorDualMesh.C
OperatorFacesMesh.C
OperatorReconnect.C
OperatorRegularize.C
Rebuild_virtual_layer.C
UserFields.C
ArrOfBit.C
ArrOfDouble.C
ArrOfFloat.C
ArrOfInt.C
Connectivite_som_elem.C
Motcle.C
Octree_Double.C
Octree_Int.C
Static_Int_Lists.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
lataEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtlataFileFormat.C
LataDB.C
LataFilter.C
LataStructures.C
LataV1_field_definitions.C
LataWriter.C
Lata_tools.C
LmlReader.C
OpenDXWriter.C
OperatorBoundary.C
OperatorDualMesh.C
OperatorFacesMesh.C
OperatorReconnect.C
OperatorRegularize.C
Rebuild_virtual_layer.C
UserFields.C
ArrOfBit.C
ArrOfDouble.C
ArrOfFloat.C
ArrOfInt.C
Connectivite_som_elem.C
Motcle.C
Octree_Double.C
Octree_Int.C
Static_Int_Lists.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IlataDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IlataDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IlataDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MlataDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MlataDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MlataDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MlataDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ElataDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ElataDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ElataDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ElataDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ElataDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ElataDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ElataDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ElataDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases lata ${INSTALLTARGETS})
